artist: A R I Z O N A
title: Summer Days
lyrics:
She know she got it
Parties with her friends
And she goes out on fancy dates
She has it
But there's another girl
Behind the diamonds and Champagne

Tonight she's downtown

'Cause all her uptown boys don't understand her anyway

And she's just dancing, ooh



Make the cold nights feel like summer days

Woah, woah, woah, woah, woah, woah

Make the cold nights feel like summer days

Make the cold nights feel like summer days



She know she got it (huh), ooh

She plays hard to get

But all these games get hard to play

She post pictures, oh-oh

Of everywhere she goes

When she goes on holiday

But tonight she's downtown, mm

Traded in the diamonds and Champagne for Chardonnay

She's just dancing, oh-oh-oh



Make the cold nights feel like summer days

Woah, woah, woah, woah, woah, woah

To make the cold nights feel like summer days



Make the cold nights feel like summer days

Woah, woah, woah, woah, woah, woah

To make the cold nights feel like summer days



And she's just dancing, ooh

To make the cold nights feel like summer days, yeah
